name: C4D Woo Filter
author: Coffee4dev.com

sections.description:
A simple and lighweight plugin for creating WooCommerce category with ajax filter

Live Demo

OPTION PAGE

To enable admin options please install C4D Plugin Manager plugin

MAY BE YOU NEED

C4D Woo Variation Swatches Display variation by image, color, text. Support add multi images for variations.
C4D Woocommerce Bundle Create frequently bought together product, sell bundle products with discount, promotion
C4D Woocommerce Boost Sales Auto create upsell, cross-sell product in mini cart, cart page, popup cart, thankyou, email.
C4D Woocommerce Filter Turn your shop into ajax filter without refresh page. Support all default widget of Woocommerce.
C4D Woocommerce Cart Create popup, side cart, support display cross-sell, upsell, related product in cart.
sections.installation:
1. Upload c4d-woo-filter to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress
sections.changelog:
1.0.7

  • Fixed: error with shortcode of products.

1.0.5

  • Added: add wrap div.c4d_woo_filter_products_wrap for list products

1.0.1

  • Fix filter category, tag

1.0.0

  • Init Release
